Varus.name: Varusº
Varus.title: ºøthe Arrow of Retributionºøº
Varus.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøFor his incomparable skill with the bow and his unquestioned sense of honor, Varus was chosen to be the warden of a sacred Ionian temple. The temple was built to contain an ancient pit of corruption so vile that Ionian Elders feared it could envelop the island in darkness. Varus prided himself on his position, as only the most exceptional Ionian warriors were selected for the role. He lived with his family in a nearby village and led a quiet life of disciplined routine until the day the forces of Noxus invaded Ionia. Their shock troops left nothing but death and desolation in their wake, and the temple lay in their path. Varus was forced to make a decision. He was bound by honor to stay and defend the temple, but without him the village's few inhabitants could offer little resistance against the oncoming war machine. Gravely, he chose to fulfill his duty as a warden. The corruption could not be allowed to escape.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøHis arrows sundered the troops who tried to wrest the temple from him that day. However, when he returned to the village, he found that it had been reduced to a smoldering graveyard. Remorse at the sight of his slain family gave way to overwhelming regret and then to seething hatred. He swore to slaughter every Noxian invader, but first he needed to become stronger. He turned to that which he had sacrificed everything to protect. The pit of corruption would consume him wholly, as a flame devours a wick, but its abominable power would burn within him until he was lost. This was a path from which there could be no return. With grim resolve, he condemned himself to the black flames, feeling malevolent energy bond to his skin...and with it, the promise of ruin. He left, seeking the blood of all Noxians involved with the invasion, a grisly task that eventually led him to the invasion's most infamous perpetrators in the League of Legends.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''The life of an arrow is fleeting, built of nothing but direction and intent.''øºøºøºøº
º-- Varusº
Varus.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøFor his incomparable skill with the bow and his unquestioned sense of honor, Varus was chosen to be the warden of a sacred Ionian temple. The temple was built ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøAn early point in Blighted Quiver helps harass enemy champions and get killing blows on minions.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøDuring short range fights it's sometimes best to fire Piercing Arrow quickly, rather than charging it to full power.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºTry to take advantage of Piercing Arrow's very long range to snipe at enemy champions before a fight or as they're trying to flee.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøIf you are affected by Blight Varus' abilities will deal extra damage to you.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøWhen he gets a kill or assist Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed and is much more dangerous.ºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºYou'll get bound in place if a tendril from Varus' ultimate, Chain of Corruption, reaches you. You can cause the tendril to die however by running far enough away from it.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøPiercing Arrowº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøVarus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.øºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºFirst Cast:ººøºøºøºø Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage.ºøºøºøºøº

ºSecond Cast:ººø Varus fires, dealing øº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ f1 }}) to º{{ e2 }} (+º{{ f2 }})ºøº physical damage, reduced by ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøº% per enemy hit (minimum 33%).ºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhile preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by 20%. After 4 seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds half its mana cost.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøBlighted Quiverº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøVarus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum health.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ººøVarus' basic attacks deal ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø bonus magic damage and apply Blight for øºøº{{ e3 }}ºø seconds (stacks º{{ e4 }}º times). º

ºøºøºøºVarus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to ºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%)ºøºøºøºø of the target's maximum Health per stack (Max: 360 total damage vs Monsters).øºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøHail of Arrowsº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøVarus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their healing and regeneration. ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºø Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals øºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºø physical damage and desecrates the ground for ºøºøº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

ºøºøºDesecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºø% and reduces healing effects by ºøº{{ e4 }}%.

spells.name: ºøChain of Corruptionøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøVarus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact. ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºø Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºø magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for 2 seconds.ºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºThe corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions, applying the same damage and immobilize if it reaches them.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºøLiving Vengeanceº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøOn kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.ºøºøºøºøºøº
